text: This one is fashioned in multicam, previously used by the U.S. Army.
This one is colored coyote brown.
This one is colored ranger green.
This one is colored olive drab.
This one is covered with the woodland pattern.
This one comes in the color of sand.
This one is colored navy blue.
This one is decorated with the black multicam pattern, for that stealth feeling.
This one is decorated with the desert multicam pattern, for when you suddenly find yourself in Nevada.
This one is decorated with the white multicam pattern, for when your target is the top of Everest.
This one is decorated with the OCP pattern, the camouflage previously employed by the U.S. Army.
This one is decorated with the ACU pattern, previously used by the U.S. Army.
